ticket.title: Are I18n yml files thought to be html_safe? (AWDwR3, section 13)
ticket.original-body:
With the next XSS support, I'm finding that I need to do things like the following: @@@

<%=raw I18n.t('main.title') %>

@@@ What should be discussed is whether or not the data found in I18N YAML files are thought to be html_safe!, or should be considered as plain text (and therefore escaped). Related: https://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/8994-ruby-on-rails/tickets/2409-activerecord-double-escapes-error_messages_for
